description:
---
### [choco://dell-update](choco://dell-update)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

This package contains the Dell Update Windows Universal application. Dell Update application automatically updates critical fixes and important device drivers as they become available.

### Importance RECOMMENDED
Dell Technologies highly recommends applying this important update as soon as possible. The update contains critical bug fixes and changes to improve functionality, reliability, and stability of your Dell system. It may also include security fixes and other feature enhancements.

### Important Information
Dell Update Classic interface is not supported from version 4.7 and later. If you have Dell Update Classic, Dell Update version 4.7+ UWP is installed.

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/dell-update/readme.md)**
    

---

**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**

---
summary: Dell Update application automatically updates critical fixes and important device drivers as they become available.
author: Dell Inc.
